live_updates: Teams have confirmed a power outage is present in the area affecting our equipment. Please refer to your local power company for any updates. Once power is restored, services in the area should begin working. Our next update will be after the power is restored. Thank you for your patience.
Technicians are on site working to restore service as quickly as possible. No ETA at this time but we will continue to monitor the situation and provide updates when available.
Our teams are looking into it. Please stay tuned for updates.
58247.summary: Some customers in South Surrey are experiencing an interruption to Internet, Television and Home Phone services. We are working to restore service as quickly as possible and apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.
58247.title: Feb 24 - Surrey (South Surrey) | All Services - Outage (Fix In Progress)

live_updates: Services have been stabilized and the issue is now resolved. We thank you for your patience during the interruption.
Technicians are on site working to restore service as quickly as possible. No ETA at this time but we will continue to monitor the situation and provide updates when available.
Our teams are looking into it. Please stay tuned for updates.
